title: Joshua Cooks & Dragon
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, Penny Robenstone and Lucy MacLaren
brief_description: Through making a cake, a little boy gains some sense of independence and growth. Within this he struggles with fantasy versus reality to achieve an end product he can be proud of. Plus the story of two young girls who leave a dragon on a tram and go to the depot at night to find it.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, Penny Robenstone and Lucy MacLaren
